remarks: The union of an increasing collection of sets is its last element. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Jan-2017.)
statement:
iuninc.1 $e |- ( ph -> F Fn NN ) $.
iuninc.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. NN ) -> ( F ` n ) C_ ( F ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) $.
iuninc $p |- ( ( ph /\ i e. NN ) -> U_ n e. ( 1 ... i ) ( F ` n ) = ( F ` i ) ) $.
$d F n $.
$d i n $.
$d n ph $.
